verses.verse: Now the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> but the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> out of <S%H6235>ten<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> while nine-tenths [remained] in the [other] <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H5068>volunteered<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> but in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> on his own <S%H272>property<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> â€“ the <S%H3478>Israelites,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants<s%> and the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of Solomon's <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> From the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H6265>Athaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez;<s%>

and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1263>Baruch,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Col-hozeh, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2382>Hazaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3080>Joiarib,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7888>Shilonite.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> were 468 <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H9365>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3133>Joed,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H384>Ithiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3470>Jeshaiah;<s%>
and <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H1373>Gabbai<s%> [and] <S%H9367>Sallai,<s%> 928.

And <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%> was their <S%H6496>overseer,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Hassenuah<s%> was <S%H4932>second<s%> in <S%H5921>command<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
From the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3080>Joiarib,<s%> <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%>

<S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> the <S%H5057>leader<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%>

and their <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> who <S%H6213>performed<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> 822; and <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6421>Pelaliah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H557>Amzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%>

and his <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' <S%H242>[households,];<s%> and <S%H6023>Amashsai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5832>Azarel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H273>Ahzai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer,<s%>
and their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warriors,<s%> 128. And their <S%H6496>overseer<s%> was <S%H2068>Zabdiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9092>Haggedolim.<s%>

Now from the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hasshub,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1138>Bunni;<s%>

and <S%H7678>Shabbethai<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> from the <S%H7218>leaders<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who were in <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H2435>outside<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%>

and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Mica,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> who was the <S%H7218>leader<s%> in <S%H8462>beginning<s%> the <S%H3034>thanksgiving<s%> at <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> and <S%H1229>Bakbukiah,<s%> the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> his <S%H251>brethren;<s%> and <S%H5653>Abda<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> [were] 284.
Also the <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> and their <S%H251>brethren,<s%> who <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H8104>watch<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> [were] 172.

And the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> [and] of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> [were] in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> on his own <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

But the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants<s%> were <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H6077>Ophel,<s%> and <S%H6727>Ziha<s%> and <S%H1658>Gishpa<s%> were in <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants.<s%>

Now the <S%H6496>overseer<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Mica,<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> who were the <S%H7891>singers<s%> for the <S%H4399>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

For [there was] a <S%H4687>commandment<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> them and a <S%H548>firm<s%> <S%H548>regulation<s%> for the <S%H7891>song<s%> <S%H7891>leaders<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H6611>Pethahiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4898>Meshezabel,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> was the king's <S%H3027>representative<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>matters<s%> concerning the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now as for the <S%H9161>villages<s%> with their <S%H7704>fields,<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in Kiriath-arba and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> in <S%H1769>Dibon<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in <S%H6909>Jekabzeel<s%> and its <S%H9161>villages,<s%>
and in <S%H3091>Jeshua,<s%> in <S%H4137>Moladah<s%> and Beth-pelet,
and in Hazar-shual, in <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%>
and in <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> in <S%H4368>Meconah<s%> and in its <S%H1323>towns,<s%>
and in En-rimmon, in <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and in <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%>

<S%H2182>Zanoah,<s%> <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%> and their <S%H9161>villages,<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> and its <S%H7704>fields,<s%> <S%H5825>Azekah<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns.<s%> So they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> also [lived] from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> [onward,] at <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> and <S%H5857>Aija,<s%> at <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%>
at <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> <S%H5011>Nob,<s%> <S%H6055>Ananiah,<s%>
<S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> <S%H1664>Gittaim,<s%>
<S%H2307>Hadid,<s%> <S%H6650>Zeboim,<s%> <S%H5041>Neballat,<s%>
<S%H3850>Lod<s%> and <S%H207>Ono,<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2796>craftsmen.<s%>
And from the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> [some] <S%H4256>divisions<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> belonged to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
